docs.text:
Embedding draw.io diagrams to mkdocs Recently I wanted to include draw.io diagrams to our documentation in such way that that the diagrams would be versioned within the repository. This is just simple demo to to show they can be embedded with the viewer. Usage Create a div element with data-mxgraph-path attribute pointing to your digram file.
Implementation The footer file has been overwritten fith a simple script additions that will pick up all div elements with the attribute, fetch the associated diagram xml and then invoke GraphViewer to render the diagram. An example diagram embedded
docs.title: Embedding draw.io diagrams to mkdocs

docs.text: Recently I wanted to include draw.io diagrams to our documentation in such way that that the diagrams would be versioned within the repository.   This is just simple demo to to show they can be embedded with the viewer.
docs.title: Embedding draw.io diagrams to mkdocs

docs.text: Create a div element with data-mxgraph-path attribute pointing to your digram file.
docs.title: Usage

docs.text: The footer file has been overwritten fith a simple script additions that will pick up all div elements with the attribute, fetch the associated diagram xml and then invoke  GraphViewer  to render the diagram.
docs.title: Implementation
